item.title: Globebill is establishing a payment and bank card settlement system in Saudi Arabia
item.description:
Globebill, a global online payment company, has partnered with Saudi Arabia to establish cross-border trade settlement services. This initiative aligns with China’s “One Belt and One Road” project. Through this partnership, Globebill will introduce a payment and bank card settlement system in Saudi Arabia. This system will issue credit cards to individuals and businesses, facilitating trade between China and Saudi Arabia through Globebill’s platform. Both entities will collaborate to promote Globebill’s payment and settlement services, including the issuance of personal and corporate credit cards across the Middle East and North Africa...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/globebill-is-establishing-a-payment-and-bank-card-settlement-system-in-saudi-arabia/

item.title: The HTC One E9+ dual sim will be available in Singapore starting August 29th
item.description:
Source: HTC. The HTC One E9+ dual sim in rose gold. HTC has introduced the HTC One E9+ dual sim in Singapore. This lightweight smartphone boasts a sizable 2K display and injects vibrant colors into the signature flagship design. “This latest addition to our HTC One E series capitalizes on the success of our flagship phones, offering both sophistication and style,” stated Faisal Siddiqui, President of HTC South Asia. “The HTC One E9+ dual sim represents a continuation of HTC’s commitment to innovation and design, showcasing a large 5...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-htc-one-e9-dual-sim-will-be-available-in-singapore-starting-august-29th/

item.title: HTC reveals the new HTC One M9
item.description:
Source: HTC. The HTC One M9 will be available globally in dual-tone silver and rose gold¹ , single-tone gunmetal grey, single-tone gold and dual-tone gold and pink from mid-March. The silver and rose gold model is pictured. HTC has launched its latest flagship phone, the HTC One M9. This new addition to the HTC One line combines the best features of the award-winning HTC One M7 and HTC One M8...

item.title: Google is revealing how it plans to increase your productivity in the coming year
item.description:
Google’s annual developer conference, I/O, brought a wave of announcements for Apps, Android, Chromebooks, and the Cloud Platform. As highlighted on the official Google blog, Android now boasts a staggering one billion users who send an estimated 20 billion text messages and 93 million selfies daily. Key introductions include: Android Wear Expanding Android’s reach to wearable devices, Android Wear allows users to perform tasks or ask questions simply by saying “Ok Google...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/google-is-revealing-how-it-plans-to-increase-your-productivity-in-the-coming-year/
